comment.author: 27309380@N06
comment._content: Wow, that is the oddest looking thing I've seen today... strange late 30s Army Air Corps experimental tests.

comment.author: 23269353@N00
comment._content: New to me, as well.  The Air Corps mod was certainly a precursor of later tricycle-gear conversions of the type for the executive market after the War.

comment.author: 27309380@N06
comment._content: All I can say is real men fly "tail dragers". ;-)
